public class TouchPadMobileWidget
extends TouchPadWidget
implements com.google.gwt.event.dom.client.TouchStartHandler, com.google.gwt.event.dom.client.TouchEndHandler, com.google.gwt.event.dom.client.TouchMoveHandler

The touchpad for mobile devices (based on scrolling for better performance).

Author:
oli
